MySQL MCP server with SSH tunnel support

Related repos

  • lets AI apps securely access and explore MySQL databases
  • MySQL-compatible distributed database for scalable apps
  • Server for DuckDB with MySQL and Postgres protocols
  • Self-hosted tunnel to expose localhost through own infrastructure
  • tcp/udp tunneling tool with smart connection pooling and easy setup
  • TCP/UDP tunnel over HTTP, includes both client and server in one Go program
  • Tunnels local connections via SSH
  • reverse proxy manager with HTTP/3, CrowdSec, geo-blocking, dark mode, and no MySQL container
  • Exposes local servers via public URLs
  • SQL client for Linux systems
